summary: Project: UI transparency update across the app—set all windows to 30% opaque / 70% transparent and ensure the same transparency is applied in the Weather tab (including the laundry drying window).

existing_features.title: Update the global glass surface utilities so that all UI “window/panel” surfaces using `.glass-surface` and `.glass-surface-strong` render at 30% opaque / 70% transparent (i.e., background alpha = 0.3) while preserving existing blur, borders, and shadows.

Ensure the Laundry Drying panel in the Weather tab uses the same global glass surface styling (30% opaque / 70% transparent) as other windows/panels, instead of its current custom `bg-card/80` styling, so it visually matches the rest of the app.

Verify and enforce that all other major window/panel surfaces across all tabs (Weather, Farmer, Driver, Radar, Beach, and empty states) use the global glass utilities (or otherwise match the 30% opaque / 70% transparent ratio) so the transparency is consistent app-wide.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply 30% opaque / 70% transparent styling to all windows and the Weather tab (including the laundry drying window).

projectName: Apply 30% opaque / 70% transparent glass surfaces across all panels (including Weather tab laundry panel)
